verbose_text: ROCK has several phosphorylation substrates, including myosin light chain (MLC), myosin light chain phosphatase (MLCP), and LIM kinase (LIMK), and recent studies have identified ROCK as a promising candidate for the therapy of highly metastatic cancer.
